translation.en: [interviewer] Okay, we're recording.

translation.en: [Barriss] I was in an argument with someone that most people would consider a hacker.

translation.en: I was reading the texts on my phone,

translation.en: and I guess I said something that kind of, I have to assume, like, insulted his pride or his ego or something.

translation.en: And this person sent the SWAT team to my house at midnight.
translation.it: E questa persona mandò la SWAT a casa mia a mezzanotte.

translation.en: [Barriss] When I looked out my window, I noticed it was really bright outside, like, really bright.
translation.it: Guardai fuori dalla finestra e vidi un sacco di luce, ma davvero tanta.

translation.en: So then I walked out my room and opened the front door.

translation.en: And it… I looked up in the sky and there was a helicopter.

translation.en: The light was so bright that it was…
translation.it: C'era così tanta luce che…

translation.en: It seemed like it was mid-afternoon, that's how bright the light was.
translation.it: Era così intensa che sembrava metà pomeriggio.

translation.it: Poco dopo, iniziarono ad arrivare le volanti

translation.it: Per me fu davvero illuminante

translation.en: that-- that he could do that to my house over nothing,

translation.en: ,'cause it was a hoax call. Whatever he said, wasn't true.

translation.en: He said that someone was being held hostage in the closet.

translation.en: I learned later that he even pretended to be the girl that was allegedly being held hostage in my closet.
translation.it: Si era perfino spacciato per la ragazza che, a suo dire, avrei tenuto in ostaggio.

translation.en: I wasn't scared for my life. I didn't feel like I was gonna die or anything.
translation.it: Non temevo per la mia vita. Non pensavo di morire.

translation.en: I just thought it was cool that he could do that.

translation.en: [interviewer] You thought it was cool.

translation.en: [Barriss] That's what I thought about that experience.
translation.it: È quel che pensai di quell'esperienza.

translation.en: Quite frankly, I was thinking, "Holy shit."
translation.it: Francamente pensai: "Cazzo.

translation.en: "This guy actually just sent the SWAT team to my house,
translation.it: Questo tizio mi ha mandato la SWAT a casa

translation.en: and he's not worried at all about the consequences."
translation.it: senza preoccuparsi minimamente delle conseguenze".

translation.en: [woman in phone recording] This call is from a federal prison.

translation.it: È uno scherzo telefonico su un crimine fasullo

translation.en: to get the SWAT team to go to someone's house.
translation.it: per mandare la SWAT a casa di qualcuno.

translation.it: Le SWAT della Contea di Nassau

translation.en: Down! Get on the ground!

translation.en: It's not funny and it's like…

translation.en: -Um… -A waste of police time, whoever did it.

translation.en: Being able to send the police to kick in someone's door
translation.it: Riuscire a mandare la polizia a sfondare una porta

translation.en: while this is all on camera,

translation.en: kind of ups the ante.
translation.it: alza la posta in gioco.

translation.en: People who perpetrate this are looking for bomb dogs, helicopters.

translation.en: That's all part of the "fun."

translation.en: [Krebs] It's about being feared.
translation.it: Il punto è essere temuti,

translation.it: diventare famosi,

translation.en: Making the world acknowledge your presence.

translation.it: Per molti di loro, ogni tipo di attenzione è buona.

translation.en: Somebody cares enough about me to send the SWAT team to my house?
translation.it: Qualcuno tiene tanto a me da mandarmi la SWAT a casa?

translation.en: I must be important.
translation.it: Allora conto.

translation.en: [reporter 4] But the FBI's biggest concern, that one day,
translation.it: Ma l'FBI teme principalmente che questi scherzi telefonici criminali diventino mortali.

translation.en: these criminal crank calls will turn deadly.
translation.it: che questi scherzi telefonici criminali diventino mortali.

translation.en: And then we'll change her face, hair, and clothing.
translation.it: E poi le cambiamo faccia, capelli e vestiti.

translation.en: Let's go with Gigi, 'cause that's easy.
translation.it: La chiamiamo Gigi perché è facile.

translation.en: We'll do a random last name.

translation.en: I play video games 'cause it's fun for me.
translation.it: Gioco ai videogiochi perché mi diverto.

translation.en: You can be really creative with it sometimes.
translation.it: Si può essere molto creativi.

translation.en: Oh my gosh. She looks crazy.
translation.it: Oddio. Sembra pazza.

translation.en: [chuckling] Look at her legs.
translation.it: Guardale le gambe.

translation.en: What kind of power workouts are you doing?

translation.en: I deal with anxiety and stuff like that.

translation.en: When you have anxiety, you tend to like revert in yourself
translation.it: Quando soffri di ansia, tendi a chiuderti in te stesso

translation.en: and do things that feel better for you.

translation.en: Ooh, where should we go? Prettier houses in Oasis Springs.

translation.en: Okay, this is Tyler, and it's Christmas Day.

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] Really, the reason I started gaming was my friend, Tyler.

translation.en: -[gamer 2] Shut the fuck up-- -[gamer 3] Shut the fuck up piece of shit!

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, that was the first thing I ever tried was evacuating a building.
translation.it: La prima cosa che ho provato è stata l'evacuazione di un edificio.

translation.en: The same person who swatted me sent the bomb squad to a school.

translation.en: The first thing that I wanted to try to do was make headlines like that.

translation.en: I tried evacuating a college university.

translation.en: That was the first thing that I ever tried to evacuate and it was on the news the same day.
translation.it: Fu il mio primo tentativo di evacuazione e finì subito sui giornali.

translation.en: At that point, I knew, "Okay, since that worked, this is legit."
translation.it: Dato che aveva funzionato, capii che potevo farlo.

translation.en: Like, I could probably do this to any location in the United States.
translation.it: Probabilmente avrei potuto farlo ovunque negli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: It'll get evacuated as long as the call sounds believable.
translation.it: Se la telefonata risultava credibile, partiva l'evacuazione.

translation.en: Wherever I do this is going to get evacuated.
translation.it: Avrebbero evacuato dappertutto.

translation.it: che ero in grado di fare evacuare molte scuole in tutto il Paese.

translation.it: che ero in grado di fare evacuare molte scuole in tutto il Paese. - Era anche l'epoca - Volevo…

translation.it: Non dicevo… Le sparatorie non c'entravano. Io segnalavo bombe nelle scuole.

translation.it: Le sparatorie non c'entravano. Io segnalavo bombe nelle scuole.

translation.it: Ma la gente era nervosa per via delle sparatorie nel Paese.

translation.en: Did that factor into your thinking?

translation.en: [Barriss] That wasn't… that didn't make me think I was going to have
translation.it: Diciamo che non mi fece pensare che avrei avuto

translation.en: any more success in having something evacuated.

translation.en: It wasn't a relevant factor in my mind.
translation.it: A mio avviso, non era un fattore rilevante.

translation.en: [Barriss] It's the fact that I knew I was breaking the law
translation.it: Mi intrigava sapere che stavo infrangendo la legge

translation.en: and I could get away with it.

translation.en: And there was nothing they could do to stop me.
translation.it: Non potevano fare nulla per fermarmi. Potevo continuare, telefonare alle forze dell'ordine,

translation.en: I could keep doing it. I could literally talk to law enforcement over the phone,
translation.it: per fermarmi. Potevo continuare, telefonare alle forze dell'ordine,

translation.en: lie to them, do something illegal,

translation.en: send them somewhere, have a place evacuated,

translation.en: it's coming on the news and there was nothing they could do about it.
translation.it: Sarebbe finito sui giornali, per forza.

translation.en: They couldn't find me, couldn't arrest me. Nothing they could do.

translation.en: So I could do that as much as I wanted. I was… I was like, unstoppable, you could say.

translation.en: ["Jane Doe"] A lot of people praised him.
translation.it: Molti lo elogiavano.

translation.en: People being like, "Wow, you're so cool," or, "Wow, can't believe you're doing this and not getting caught." Stuff like that.

translation.it: Avevo appena iniziato a mandare gli artificieri nelle scuole

translation.it: potevo far evacuare lo studio televisivo.

translation.en: It's unusual for those who report the news to become the news.

translation.en: Well, that's what happened today to the staff at KABC, in Southern California.
translation.it: ma è quello che è successo oggi allo staff della KABC.

translation.en: after a bomb threat forced everyone in that building to evacuate.

translation.it: Stavano trasmettendo in diretta su Channel 7 News

translation.en: when I made the phone call.
translation.it: quando ho chiamato.

translation.en: So I thought it would be interesting to make that call,
translation.it: Mi pareva interessante chiamare

translation.en: and watch the TV and see what happened on the TV.
translation.it: e guardare tutto in diretta TV.

translation.en: [reporter] A bomb squad and search dogs combed through the building,
translation.it: Dopo aver setacciato l'edificio,

translation.en: eventually ruling it safe to re-enter.
translation.it: hanno stabilito che era sicuro rientrare.

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler's grandmother immediately suspects Tyler and confronts him.
translation.it: La nonna di Tyler sospetta subito di lui e lo affronta.

translation.en: And says, "I know you did this."
translation.it: Gli dice: "So che sei stato tu".

translation.en: He says, "Yes, I did it." "But you will not tell another living soul
translation.it: E lui: "Sì, sono stato io, ma non devi dirlo ad anima viva,

translation.en: or else I will beat you bloody and I will blow up our house."
translation.it: sennò ti picchio a sangue e faccio esplodere la casa".

translation.en: And she's terrified.
translation.it: Lei è terrorizzata.

translation.en: However, she has a longtime friend who's a college police officer
translation.it: Ma ha un vecchio amico che fa il poliziotto in un college

translation.en: and she confides in him the fact that Tyler did this bomb threat.
translation.it: e gli confida che quell'allarme è opera di Tyler.

translation.en: [Dorroh] My primary job is, I'm an explosives investigator for the bomb squad.
translation.it: Il mio compito principale è indagare per conto degli artificieri.

translation.en: Back in September, October 2015,
translation.it: A settembre, ottobre 2015,

translation.en: there were a series of swatting incidents
translation.it: ci fu una serie di episodi di swatting

translation.en: that were being called in across the country.
translation.it: in tutto il Paese.

translation.en: There were also cases involving bomb threats,
translation.it: C'erano stati anche casi di allarmi bomba

translation.en: and we weren't sure at the time if they were all related or not.
translation.it: e non sapevamo ancora se fossero collegati.

translation.en: But on September 29th,
translation.it: Ma il 29 settembre,

translation.en: I responded to two school bomb threats in the San Fernando Valley.
translation.it: risposi a due allarmi bomba in due scuole della San Fernando Valley.

translation.en: One was at a junior high, one was at an elementary school.
translation.it: Una scuola media e una scuola elementare.

translation.en: We took the police reports,
translation.it: Prendemmo i verbali

translation.en: and then got in contact with the Glendale police officers.
translation.it: e contattammo la polizia di Glendale.

translation.en: They advised me that they had arrested a person by the name of Tyler Barriss
translation.it: Qui mi dissero di aver arrestato un certo Tyler Barriss.

translation.en: after calling in a bomb threat to the news stations there in Glendale.
translation.it: che aveva lanciato un allarme bomba ai notiziari di Glendale.

translation.en: That's the first time I heard his name.
translation.it: Fu così che lo conobbi.

translation.en: I had to take and piece together the forensic trail.
translation.it: Dovevo radunare i dati della scientifica.

translation.en: The first thing I did was met up with the 14-year-old student
translation.it: Per prima cosa, incontrai la studentessa di 14 anni che aveva risposto nell'ufficio

translation.en: who took the telephone call at the office at the middle school.
translation.it: incontrai la studentessa di 14 anni che aveva risposto nell'ufficio della scuola media. Ascoltammo le registrazioni

translation.en: We played the audio recordings for six different swatting calls that I had.
translation.it: della scuola media. Ascoltammo le registrazioni di sei chiamate di swatting che avevo.

translation.en: And as soon as we hit the, uh, Tyler Barriss audio recordings,
translation.it: E appena arrivammo alle registrazioni di Tyler Barriss,

translation.en: she was like… she knew exactly. She was emphatic that was him.
translation.it: lei non ebbe dubbi. Disse subito che era lui.

translation.en: [Dorroh] Tyler Barriss has a distinctive voice.
translation.it: Tyler ha una voce particolare.

translation.en: When I get these different calls, I typically give them a title so I can keep them all.
translation.it: In genere do un titolo alle varie chiamate per tenerle.

translation.en: You know, "mush-mouth," "baritone." Something along those lines.
translation.it: "Bocca spappolata", "baritono". Cose così.

translation.en: With Tyler Barriss, I used the word "snide."
translation.it: Per Tyler Barriss, ho usato l'aggettivo "maligno".

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler became very adept at covering his tracks.
translation.it: Tyler divenne molto abile nel coprire le sue tracce.

translation.en: He always used the voice over IP services
translation.it: Usava sempre i servizi di VoIP

translation.en: to call from numbers that would dead-end somewhere that was not connected to him.
translation.it: per chiamare da numeri che non avremmo potuto collegare a lui.

translation.en: [Dorroh] We had tied him into a number of other cases across the country.
translation.it: L'avevamo collegato a molti altri casi in tutto il Paese.

translation.en: We had five LAX bomb threats that he was responsible for.
translation.it: Era responsabile di cinque allarmi bomba all'aeroporto di Los Angeles.

translation.en: At one point I tied him into seven in one week.
translation.it: A un momento, fu collegato a sette in una settimana.

translation.en: He would change his script along the way, but it was the voice
translation.it: Cambiava il copione strada facendo, ma risalivamo sempre

translation.en: that we always came back to.
translation.it: alla voce.

translation.en: [Koerner] They'd go and arrest Tyler at the house in Chatsworth.
translation.it: Arrestarono Tyler nella casa di Chatsworth.

translation.en: [Koerner] Ultimately, Tyler Barriss pleads no contest to the charges,
translation.it: Tyler Barriss non contesta le accuse a suo carico

translation.en: and is sentenced to approximately two years in the Los Angeles County Jail.
translation.it: e viene condannato a circa due anni nel carcere della Contea di Los Angeles.

translation.en: His grandmother, fearing for her own life,
translation.it: Sua nonna, temendo per la sua vita, aveva richiesto un ordine restrittivo.

translation.en: had taken out a restraining order against him.
translation.it: temendo per la sua vita, aveva richiesto un ordine restrittivo.

translation.en: [Barriss] It was my first time ever being in jail. Everything was all new to me.
translation.it: Era la mia prima volta in prigione. Era tutto nuovo per me.

translation.en: I wasn't worried or scared.
translation.it: Non ero preoccupato o spaventato. Mi dicevo piuttosto:

translation.en: It was more like, "Okay, well, my bail was a million dollars,
translation.it: Non ero preoccupato o spaventato. Mi dicevo piuttosto: "La cauzione è di un milione di dollari. Sono bloccato in questa situazione".

translation.en: and I'm stuck in this situation."
translation.it: "La cauzione è di un milione di dollari. Sono bloccato in questa situazione".

translation.en: So, it just was what it was. I was just doing the time until I ended up getting out.
translation.it: Non avevo alternative. Avrei dovuto scontare la pena fino alla fine.

translation.en: I got released from the county jail after 16 months.
translation.it: Fui rilasciato dopo 16 mesi.

translation.en: It was 2:00 a.m. when I finally stepped foot outside.
translation.it: Erano le due di notte quando misi piede fuori.

translation.en: I had nowhere to go.
translation.it: Non sapevo dove andare.

translation.en: I didn't have anywhere to stay. I didn't know anyone in LA.
translation.it: Non avevo un alloggio e nemmeno un amico a LA.

translation.en: [Barriss] My grandmother, she had already told me not to go back.
translation.it: Mia nonna mi aveva già detto di non tornare.

translation.en: But I don't know how to be homeless and survive in the streets and do all that.
translation.it: Ma non ero in grado di sopravvivere per strada.

translation.en: I just went back to the only place that I knew, which was my house.
translation.it: Tornai a casa, l'unico posto che conoscevo.

translation.en: All the doors were locked and I just camped out back all night,
translation.it: Tutte le porte erano chiuse, così mi accampai fuori

translation.en: until about 6:00 a.m.
translation.it: fino alle sei del mattino.

translation.en: I've lived with her my whole life. I know what her routine is.
translation.it: Avevo vissuto con lei. Ne conoscevo la routine.

translation.en: I kind of just hung out in the backyard until she unlocked the back door to do some laundry.
translation.it: Rimasi lì finché non aprì la porta sul retro per fare il bucato.

translation.en: And I just walked in the house.
translation.it: E poi entrai.

translation.en: She was kind of shocked that I was there,
translation.it: Vedendomi, rimase scioccata

translation.en: and she told me that I wasn't supposed to be there.
translation.it: e mi disse che non avrei dovuto stare lì.

translation.en: He contacted the grandmother, a violation of the restraining order.
translation.it: Contattò la nonna violando l'ordine restrittivo,

translation.en: And we put him right back in custody again.
translation.it: così lo rimettemmo in carcere.

translation.en: Tyler lives in his own little world.
translation.it: Il mondo di Tyler è piccolo.

translation.en: He doesn't have any real-world friends.
translation.it: Non ha amici nel mondo reale. Non ha datori di lavoro

translation.en: He doesn't have any employers or anything along those lines.
translation.it: Non ha amici nel mondo reale. Non ha datori di lavoro o cose del genere.

translation.en: So I think his only lifeline that he has is his grandmother
translation.it: Credo che la sua unica ancora di salvezza sia sua nonna

translation.en: and he spoiled that relationship.
translation.it: e lui ha rovinato quel rapporto.

translation.en: [Koerner] Tyler was then in jail from January 2017 to August 2017.
translation.it: Tyler rimase in prigione da gennaio 2017 ad agosto 2017.

translation.en: It makes you really sad to, like, grow up with somebody
translation.it: È molto triste crescere con qualcuno

translation.en: and be really close with them for such a long time,
translation.it: e stargli molto vicino per tanto tempo

translation.en: and next thing you know, they're in jail and their whole life is upside-down,
translation.it: e poi vederlo finire in prigione con la vita sconvolta

translation.en: and you don't recognize who's in front of you anymore.
translation.it: e non riconoscerlo più.

translation.en: We kind of lost contact and I moved on with my life.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso i contatti e io sono andata avanti con la mia vita.

translation.en: [Koerner] When Tyler is released,
translation.it: Quando Tyler esce,

translation.en: he finds a homeless shelter to live in near Exposition Park in Los Angeles.
translation.it: trova un rifugio per senzatetto vicino a Exposition Park, a Los Angeles.

translation.en: He ends up spending all his time going to a library near the homeless shelter.
translation.it: Finisce per passare tutto il tempo in una biblioteca vicino al rifugio.

translation.en: [Dorroh] He goes right back to doing what he believes he's singularly best at.
translation.it: Torna a fare ciò in cui crede di essere il migliore.

translation.en: [Dorroh] He was using his cell phone on the public Wi-Fi system
translation.it: Usava il suo cellulare sul sistema Wi-Fi pubblico

translation.en: to make these calls.
translation.it: per fare le chiamate.

translation.en: And he would do it for a variety of reasons.
translation.it: E lo faceva per una serie di motivi.

translation.en: Sometimes he would do it for pay.
translation.it: A volte lo faceva a pagamento.

translation.en: [Koerner] This is a person who's never held a traditional job,
translation.it: È una persona che non ha mai avuto un lavoro normale

translation.en: and maybe lacks a lot of the skills necessary to do so.
translation.it: e forse non ha nemmeno le competenze necessarie.

translation.en: [interviewer] How much were you making per swat?
translation.it: Quanto prendevi per swat?

translation.en: [Barriss] I was charging people depending on how much of a stranger they were to me,
translation.it: In base al grado di estraneità dei committenti, mi facevo pagare

translation.en: anywhere from $20 to $50 per swat.
translation.it: fra i 20 e i 50 dollari per swat.

translation.en: But, quite frankly, I enjoyed the thrill of swatting.
translation.it: Ma, a dirla tutta, mi piaceva il brivido dello swatting.

translation.en: I just enjoyed doing it.
translation.it: Mi piaceva farlo.

translation.en: Having it appear on the news and then bragging about it on Twitter.
translation.it: Finire sui notiziari e vantarmene su Twitter.

translation.en: [interviewer] Yeah. [Barriss] I just, for whatever reason, enjoyed doing that.
translation.it: Non saprei dire perché, ma mi piaceva farlo.

translation.en: [911 operator] Hi, what's going on?
translation.it: Salve, che succede?

translation.en: [Barriss] My dad, he's going crazy, he's got his gun out.
translation.it: Mio padre ha estratto la pistola. AUTUNNO 2017

translation.en: [Dorroh] He enjoyed swatting people. It was his form of entertainment.
translation.it: Gli piaceva lo swatting. Era la sua forma di intrattenimento.

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, I left some bombs at my high school and they're gonna blow up in 15 minutes.
translation.it: Ho messo delle bombe al mio liceo ed esploderanno tra 15 minuti.

translation.en: Just scared. I don't see why people would want to harm children.
translation.it: Solo paura. Non vedo perché qualcuno voglia fare del male ai bambini.

translation.en: [Dorroh] He had about a dozen different Twitter handles.
translation.it: Aveva una dozzina di nomi diversi su Twitter.

translation.en: He would post links to the news stories on it,
translation.it: Pubblicava i link alle notizie

translation.en: you know, as "proof," taking credit for it.
translation.it: come "prova" per prendersene il merito.

translation.en: [reporter] We have new information on the bomb threat that led to an evacuation
translation.it: Novità sull'allarme bomba che ha portato all'evacuazione

translation.en: of the Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center.
translation.it: del Centro Kay Bailey Hutchison.

translation.en: [man] We heard an alarm go off, like, ten times?
translation.it: Abbiamo sentito un allarme suonare dieci volte e il messaggio:

translation.en: And they're like, "We need you to leave."
translation.it: Abbiamo sentito un allarme suonare dieci volte e il messaggio: "Dovete evacuare".

translation.en: [Dorroh] During the time period that he was out of custody,
translation.it: Durante il periodo in cui era in libertà,

translation.en: we found approximately 37 other cases
translation.it: ci sono stati altri 37 casi

translation.en: that he had called in bomb threats or swattings.
translation.it: di allarmi bomba o di swatting.

translation.en: [Barriss] I'm upset with some people.
translation.it: Sono con delle persone.

translation.en: They got me mad, so now they're going to pay for it.
translation.it: Mi hanno fatto arrabbiare e me la pagheranno.

translation.en: And I also have a gun too.
translation.it: Ho anche una pistola.

translation.en: [Dorroh] He was like a one-man wrecking crew.
translation.it: Era come un bulldozer.

translation.en: He was just out of control.
translation.it: Era fuori controllo.

translation.en: [Koerner] A couple weeks later, the Federal Communications Commission in Washington, DC
translation.it: Qualche settimana dopo, la Commissione Federale per le Comunicazioni

translation.en: is having a very key meeting about the future of net neutrality.
translation.it: ha un incontro chiave sul futuro della neutralità della rete.

translation.en: [Barriss] The FCC, broadcasting the vote on net neutrality live on Twitter
translation.it: La FCC, che trasmetteva il voto sulla neutralità della rete su Twitter,

translation.en: had like 160,000 viewers, at the time.
translation.it: aveva all'epoca 160.000 spettatori.

translation.en: And it was a federal building,
translation.it: Era un edificio federale,

translation.en: a little bit more high profile than some of my other evacuations.
translation.it: quindi di profilo più alto rispetto ad altre evacuazioni.

translation.en: So I posted on Twitter that I was gonna evacuate that building.
translation.it: Così scrissi su Twitter che avrei fatto evacuare l'edificio.

translation.en: On advice of security, we need to take a brief recess.
translation.it: PRESIDENTE, FCC La sicurezza ci consiglia una breve pausa.

translation.en: [Koerner] This is a huge issue the FCC is considering, of national importance.
translation.it: L'FCC stava discutendo un tema di importanza nazionale.

translation.en: And Tyler is well aware of the importance to his community, to gamers in particular.
translation.it: Tyler sa bene cosa comporta per la sua comunità, specie i giocatori,

translation.en: And once again, he takes credit for this and laughs about it.
translation.it: e, ancora una volta, se ne prende il merito e ci ride.

translation.en: He takes great pride that his power now extends to the halls of government.
translation.it: È molto fiero di essere arrivato ai palazzi del governo.

translation.en: [Barriss] I wasn't trying to scare them out of voting or whatever was going on.
translation.it: Non intendevo spaventarli e indurli a non votare o altro.

translation.en: That didn't concern me. I just knew it was gonna bring my Twitter a lot of attention.
translation.it: Non mi riguardava. Sapevo solo che avrei suscitato tanta attenzione.

translation.en: And my Twitter was quite popular that day.
translation.it: E il mio Twitter fu molto visitato quel giorno.

translation.en: Gamers and hackers and people doing dark criminal stuff online.
translation.it: Giocatori, hacker e persone che compivano atti criminali online.

translation.en: My Twitter was quite popular in that scene of individuals.
translation.it: Il mio Twitter era molto famoso in quella cerchia di persone.

translation.en: Whoever it is running this Twitter is swatting and evacuating everything.
translation.it: Chiunque gestisca questi account fa swatting ed evacuazioni.

translation.en: [Dorroh] Since 2014,
translation.it: Dal 2014 seguo indagini

translation.en: I had been investigating swatting cases more and more.
translation.it: Dal 2014 seguo indagini su sempre più casi di swatting,

translation.en: We all recognized, even the gaming community recognized it, as a dangerous practice.
translation.it: Anche la comunità dei giocatori ha riconosciuto che è pericoloso.

translation.en: But we never had that fatality and we were just kind of waiting for it.
translation.it: Ma per ora non ci sono stati i morti previsti.

translation.en: We knew it was going to happen.
translation.it: Sapevamo che sarebbe successo.

translation.en: [Koerner] On December 28, 2017,
translation.it: Il 28 dicembre 2017,

translation.en: Shane Gaskill, who lives in Wichita, Kansas,
translation.it: Shane Gaskill, che vive a Wichita, Kansas,

translation.en: is playing Call of Duty with another gamer named Casey Viner,
translation.it: sta giocando a Call of Duty con un altro giocatore, Casey Viner,

translation.en: who lives outside Cincinnati.
translation.it: che vive fuori Cincinnati.

translation.en: They're playing on a site where you can actually win small amounts of money
translation.it: Giocano su un sito dove puoi vincere piccole somme di denaro

translation.en: for winning one of these games.
translation.it: per uno di questi giochi.

translation.en: In the midst of all this violent chaos,
translation.it: In mezzo a tutto questo caos violento,

translation.en: Shane Gaskill accidentally shoots Casey Viner's character to death.
translation.it: Shane Gaskill uccide accidentalmente il personaggio di Casey Viner.

translation.en: [Koerner] They lose the game
translation.it: Perdono la partita

translation.en: and don't get the $1.50 wager that had been placed on the game.
translation.it: e non ricevono la posta in palio di 1,50 dollari.

translation.en: Shane and Casey get into a huge dispute about this online,
translation.it: Shane e Casey litigano furiosamente online per questo episodio

translation.en: and Casey decides that he wants to take revenge on Shane Gaskill.
translation.it: e Casey decide di vendicarsi di Shane Gaskill.

translation.en: Casey knew exactly where to go.
translation.it: Casey sapeva bene dove andare.

translation.en: And so he contacted "SWAuTistic" as Tyler was known online.
translation.it: Così contattò "SWAuTistic", il nome con cui Tyler era noto online.

translation.en: [Koerner] Shane Gaskill saw that "SWAuTistic" was now following him to collect information.
translation.it: Shane Gaskill vide che "SWAuTistic" lo stava seguendo per avere informazioni.

translation.en: And then Shane Gaskill sent a direct message to Tyler Barriss.
translation.it: E allora inviò un messaggio diretto a Tyler Barriss.

translation.en: "Please try some shit. I'll be waiting."
translation.it: "Inventati qualcosa. Io aspetto.

translation.en: "1033 West McCormick Street, Wichita, Kansas."
translation.it: 1033 West McCormick Street, Wichita, Kansas."

translation.en: This is a person telling the ostensibly most feared swatter
translation.it: Stava praticamente dicendo allo swatter forse più temuto

translation.en: that he doesn't have the balls to go through with it.
translation.it: che non aveva le palle per agire.

translation.en: Tyler kind of had a God complex. His ego was really big.
translation.it: Tyler aveva deliri di onnipotenza e un ego smisurato.

translation.en: [Barriss] People are actually ignorant and arrogant enough to give you their address
translation.it: Qualcuno ha l'ignoranza e l'arroganza di darti l'indirizzo

translation.en: and tell you to come do something.
translation.it: e dirti di fare qualcosa.

translation.en: [911 operator] This is 911. What's going on?
translation.it: Pronto intervento. Che succede?

translation.en: [Barriss] My mom and dad, they were arguing and I shot him in the head.
translation.it: I miei stavano litigando, io ho sparato in testa a mio padre

translation.en: And he's not breathing anymore.
translation.it: e ora non respira più.

translation.en: [911 operator] Do you have any weapons on you?
translation.it: Hai delle armi addosso?

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, I do. A handgun.
translation.it: Sì. Una pistola.

translation.en: [911 operator] Okay. What's your address?
translation.it: Ok. Mi dai l'indirizzo?

translation.en: [Barriss] It's 1033 West McCormick Street.
translation.it: Abito al 1033 di West McCormick Street.

translation.en: [Koerner] The problem is, Shane Gaskill had given the wrong address.
translation.it: Il problema è che Shane Gaskill aveva dato l'indirizzo sbagliato.

translation.en: It wasn't Shane's house.
translation.it: Non era la casa di Shane.

translation.en: And the people who actually lived in the house at that time was the Finch family.
translation.it: E le persone che allora vivevano in quella casa erano i Finch.

translation.en: [Francis Finch] Andrew Finch is my mom's brother.
translation.it: Andrew Finch è il fratello di mia madre.

translation.en: October 27th, 2002,
translation.it: Il 27 ottobre 2002,

translation.en: my mother got into a car crash
translation.it: mia madre ebbe un incidente

translation.en: on her way to Texas to get me and my sister.
translation.it: mentre veniva a prendere me e mia sorella.

translation.en: She rolled three times in her truck and was pronounced dead on scene.
translation.it: Si ribaltò tre volte col suo furgone e fu dichiarata morta sul posto.

translation.en: I was like one or two, I believe. Andrew was like, maybe 16 or 17.
translation.it: Io avevo circa due anni. Andrew ne aveva 16 o 17 anni.

translation.en: I believe that he had felt he had a duty to take care of me and my sister.
translation.it: Credo che si sentisse in dovere di prendersi cura di me e di mia sorella.

translation.en: He taught me a lot of the things that I know now.
translation.it: Molto di ciò che so lo devo a lui.

translation.en: And that's why I regard him as my father
translation.it: Ed è per questo che lo considero mio padre

translation.en: is because I feel like a father's duty
translation.it: perché penso che il compito di un padre sia insegnare a un giovane a diventare un uomo.

translation.en: is to teach a young man how to… be a man in life.
translation.it: che il compito di un padre sia insegnare a un giovane a diventare un uomo.

translation.en: [Ali Abdelhadi] Andy actually cooked dinner for us.
translation.it: Andy aveva preparato la cena per noi.

translation.en: That day he made pasta with tomato sauce with cheese
translation.it: Quel giorno aveva fatto la pasta al pomodoro e formaggio

translation.en: and big pork chops.
translation.it: e grandi costolette di maiale.

translation.en: We were just relaxing, chilling,
translation.it: Ci stavamo rilassando

translation.en: because it was just a few days past Christmas.
translation.it: perché era passato da poco Natale

translation.en: There was a paved alley right against the house
translation.it: C'era un vicolo lastricato proprio accanto alla casa,

translation.en: where there was this huge pothole.
translation.it: dove c'era una buca enorme.

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] When I heard one vehicle, didn't seem odd. It happens all the time.
translation.it: Quando sentii un veicolo, non mi sembrò strano. Succedeva sempre.

translation.en: [Lisa] Andy got up to see who was there.
translation.it: Andy si alzò per vedere chi c'era.

translation.en: By this point, police had surrounded the house.
translation.it: A quel punto, la polizia aveva circondato la casa.

translation.en: And Andrew opens the door
translation.it: Andrew aprì la porta

translation.en: and he's caught by police lights,
translation.it: e fu investito dalle luci della polizia.

translation.en: officers all over to the east of the house, to the west of the house, directly in front of the house.
translation.it: C'erano agenti a est della casa, a ovest della casa, davanti alla casa.

translation.en: [Lisa] He didn't know who was there for him. You know, he didn't know.
translation.it: Non sapeva chi potesse essere. Non lo sapeva.

translation.en: [officer 1] Hey, front door! Hands!
translation.it: - Ehi, alla porta d'ingresso! - Le mani!

translation.en: -[officer 2] Show your hands! -[officer 1] He's right there.
translation.it: - Mani in vista! - È lì.

translation.en: [officer 3] Walk this way!
translation.it: Si avvicini!

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] I started hearing commands from everywhere.
translation.it: Iniziai a sentire ordini da ogni parte.

translation.en: I didn't exactly make them out.
translation.it: Non capivo cosa dicevano.

translation.en: Shouting.
translation.it: Urlavano.

translation.en: [Haze] And in the seven seconds of opening the door,
translation.it: E nei sette secondi dall'apertura della porta

translation.en: an officer pulled the trigger on his AR-15…
translation.it: un agente premette il grilletto del suo AR-15…

translation.en: …and shot Andrew once from, I believe, it was 67 yards away.
translation.it: e sparò una volta a Andrew da una sessantina di metri.

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] He was on his face, barely able to breathe.
translation.it: Era a faccia in giù, respirava a malapena

translation.en: And on his face and laid out in front of the front door to the inside of the house.
translation.it: ed era disteso davanti alla porta rivolto verso l'interno della casa.

translation.en: That's when Lisa came out.
translation.it: Lisa arrivò e chiese: "Ho sentito Andy urlare.

translation.en: She goes, "I heard Andy scream. What's going on?"
translation.it: Lisa arrivò e chiese: "Ho sentito Andy urlare. Che succede?" E io: "Non lo so. Vado a vedere".

translation.en: I said, "I don't know. I'm getting ready to find out."
translation.it: Che succede?" E io: "Non lo so. Vado a vedere".

translation.en: I'm looking at him, possibly dying, couldn't tell her that.
translation.it: Lo guardavo mentre rischiava la vita e non riuscivo a dirglielo.

translation.en: Figured the next shot might be coming at me. I didn't know who was shooting.
translation.it: Pensai che sarei stato il prossimo. Non sapevo chi stesse sparando.

translation.en: And then they're on their intercom saying,
translation.it: Poi dal citofono dissero:

translation.en: "Everyone get out from the east side."
translation.it: "Uscite tutti dal lato est".

translation.en: [Lisa] Telling us to come out with our hands up.
translation.it: Ci dissero di uscire con le mani in alto.

translation.en: [Haze] Dispatch was actually still on the phone with Tyler at this point.
translation.it: Il centralino era ancora al telefono con Tyler, a quel punto.

translation.en: Tyler actually stayed on the phone with 911 for 16 minutes after the shooting.
translation.it: Tyler rimase al telefono con le emergenze per 16 minuti dopo la sparatoria.

translation.en: -[Barriss] Hello? -[911 operator] I'm still here, okay?
translation.it: - Pronto? - Sono ancora qui. Sono ancora qui, ok?

translation.en: [Barriss] Yeah, me too.
translation.it: Anch'io.

translation.en: [Haze] Despite them still being on phone with the alleged hostage-taker,
translation.it: E nonostante fossero ancora al telefono con il presunto sequestratore,

translation.en: the family was dragged outside, barefoot, handcuffed.
translation.it: la famiglia fu trascinata fuori a piedi nudi, ammanettata.

translation.en: The family was basically treated as criminals,
translation.it: Furono trattati tutti come dei criminali

translation.en: while WPD tore through the house.
translation.it: quando la polizia irruppe in casa.

translation.en: [Barriss] My dad isn't breathing. It's kind of giving me anxiety and making me, like, paranoid.
translation.it: Mio padre non respira e questa cosa mi crea ansia, paranoia.

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] They kept asking us, "Who else is up there?"
translation.it: Ci chiedevano: "Chi altro c'è di sopra?"

translation.en: So we're confused at that point.
translation.it: Eravamo confusi.

translation.en: We didn't know what happened, why they were there. I kept saying, "Why are you guys here?"
translation.it: Non sapevamo perché fossero lì. Continuavo a chiederglielo.

translation.en: But their confusion was even more than our confusion.
translation.it: Ma loro erano ancora più confusi di noi.

translation.en: They couldn't tell us what's going on. They kept asking who else was in the house.
translation.it: Non sapevano darci spiegazioni e ci chiedevano chi altro c'era.

translation.en: [Francis] I was at my friend Isaac's house and I started getting these texts, like, "Are you okay?"
translation.it: Ero a casa del mio amico Isaac e iniziai a ricevere SMS tipo: "Stai bene?"

translation.en: "There's cops at your house." "Hey, are you good?"
translation.it: "C'è la polizia da te. Tutto ok?"

translation.en: "Do you know what's going on?"
translation.it: "Cosa sta succedendo?"

translation.en: I'm just, "I don't know. I'm not at my house right now."
translation.it: E io: "Non lo so. Non sono a casa adesso".

translation.en: And then like an hour goes by, maybe two,
translation.it: Poi, dopo un'ora o forse due, iniziarono a uscire degli articoli.

translation.en: articles start coming out, "Man shot at 1033 West McCormick."
translation.it: Poi, dopo un'ora o forse due, iniziarono a uscire degli articoli. "Hanno sparato a un uomo al 1033 di West McCormick."

translation.en: "Unidentified man shot at--"
translation.it: "Non identificato…"

translation.en: I almost-- like, the moment I saw "Man shot at…" I…
translation.it: Appena vidi che avevano sparato a un uomo,

translation.en: I almost knew, like, automatically.
translation.it: capii tutto automaticamente.

translation.en: And that's when I found out it was him.
translation.it: E così scoprii che era lui.

translation.en: I just like, dropped down to my knees at that point,
translation.it: A quel punto caddi in ginocchio,

translation.en: not being able to breathe.
translation.it: non riuscivo a respirare.

translation.en: I remember… almost forgetting, like, to inhale.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver quasi dimenticato di inspirare.

translation.en: I just sat there in disbelief.
translation.it: Rimasi seduto lì incredulo.

translation.en: [Haze] Andrew's niece Adelina lived with the family.
translation.it: La nipote di Andrew, Adelina, viveva con la famiglia.

translation.en: I believe she was 17 at the time of the shooting.
translation.it: Doveva avere 17 anni al momento della sparatoria.

translation.en: She was actually forced to step over Andrew
translation.it: Fu costretta a scavalcare Andrew

translation.en: as he was laying on the floor, bleeding out and gasping for air.
translation.it: che era steso sul pavimento, sanguinava e respirava a fatica.

translation.en: [Francis] They left him there on the ground until all of it was over with.
translation.it: Lo lasciarono lì a terra fino alla fine.

translation.en: So she had to walk over his body,
translation.it: Dovette camminare sul suo corpo,

translation.en: and look at him and see him, and then get handcuffed outside.
translation.it: guardarlo e vederlo prima di essere ammanettata fuori.

translation.en: [Haze] Andrew laid there for roughly 15 to 20 minutes before receiving any medical attention whatsoever.
translation.it: Andrew rimase lì per circa 15 o 20 minuti prima di ricevere cure mediche.

translation.en: Officers were actually told to not move the body,
translation.it: Agli agenti fu detto di non spostare il corpo

translation.en: and step over him,
translation.it: e di scavalcarlo

translation.en: and ambulance was on-scene, and the ambulance was held back.
translation.it: e, al suo arrivo, l'ambulanza fu trattenuta.

translation.en: Instead of going to the hospital with their family member,
translation.it: Invece di portarli in ospedale col loro familiare,

translation.en: they were taken downtown for questioning.
translation.it: li portarono in centrale per interrogarli.

translation.en: [Abdelhadi] In the interrogation room, the detective said,
translation.it: Interrogandomi, il detective disse:

translation.en: "Would you know of someone that is holding a grudge against you or the house
translation.it: "Sa se c'è qualcuno che ce l'ha così tanto con voi o con la casa

translation.en: that would actually make a false call to create chaos?"
translation.it: da fare una chiamata falsa e creare il caos?"

translation.en: I said, "Not necessarily, no, why?"
translation.it: E io: "Direi di no, perché?

translation.en: "You haven't told me, how is Andy?"
translation.it: Ma non mi ha detto come sta Andy. Perché quando l'ho visto

translation.en: "'Cause I know when I saw him inside the house,
translation.it: Ma non mi ha detto come sta Andy. Perché quando l'ho visto dentro la casa, aveva difficoltà a respirare.

translation.en: he was having a hard time breathing."
translation.it: dentro la casa, aveva difficoltà a respirare.

translation.en: "Did he get better? Did they take him to the hospital?"
translation.it: Sta meglio? È in ospedale?"

translation.en: He said, "I am very sorry, Ali, but he did not survive his wounds."
translation.it: E lui: "Mi dispiace tanto, Ali, ma non ce l'ha fatta".

translation.en: [Lisa] I did not cry. I did not get hysterical.
translation.it: Non piansi. Non feci scenate isteriche.

translation.en: I became determined
translation.it: Ero ben decisa

translation.en: and was going to do what I needed to
translation.it: a fare tutto il necessario

translation.en: to make sure this was handled.
translation.it: perché si occupassero del caso.

translation.en: For justice.
translation.it: Per avere giustizia.

translation.en: You know, I didn't know if I was going to be able to uphold myself
translation.it: Non sapevo se sarei riuscito a prendermi cura di me

translation.en: as a human being after that day.
translation.it: come essere umano dopo quel giorno.

translation.en: [Koerner] About an hour and a half after Andy Finch was shot,
translation.it: Circa un'ora e mezza dopo l'omicidio di Andy Finch,

translation.en: Shane Gaskill sent a Twitter DM to Tyler.
translation.it: Shane Gaskill mandò un messaggio su Twitter a Tyler.

translation.en: "This shit has me dying. They showed up to my old house, retard."
translation.it: "Sono morto dal ridere. Sono andati dove vivevo prima, idiota."

translation.en: To him this was the funniest thing ever,
translation.it: Per lui era il massimo

translation.en: that he basically duped the notorious Tyler Barriss into swatting the wrong house.
translation.it: aver fregato il famigerato Tyler Barriss facendogli sbagliare casa.

translation.en: Upon revealing this, Tyler defends himself and says,
translation.it: A questo punto, Tyler si difende e dice:

translation.en: "You gave an address that you don't live at,
translation.it: "Hai dato un indirizzo sbagliato,

translation.en: but you were acting tough, LOL, so you're a bitch."
translation.it: ma hai agito con fermezza, LOL, quindi sei tosto".

translation.en: Gaskill said, "Anyways, good job, but you failed the mission
translation.it: Gaskill disse: "Sei stato bravo, ma hai fallito

translation.en: because I trolled the fuck outta you guys."
translation.it: perché vi ho presi per il culo".

translation.en: And they have a petty dispute over who has bragging rights,
translation.it: Si battibeccarono un po' su chi aveva il diritto di vantarsi

translation.en: who emerged victorious in this scenario.
translation.it: e chi usciva vittorioso in questo caso.

translation.en: Right now, a false 911 call led to a deadly officer-involved shooting in…
translation.it: Dopo una chiamata fasulla, un agente ha ucciso…

translation.en: [Koerner] A couple hours later,
translation.it: Un paio d'ore dopo,

translation.en: the local newscast in Wichita start carrying reports about this death
translation.it: il telegiornale di Wichita inizia a riportare notizie su questa morte

translation.en: on West McCormick Street.
translation.it: a quell'indirizzo.

translation.en: And Gaskill realizes what's happened.
translation.it: E Gaskill capisce cos'è successo.

translation.en: And so he reaches out to both Tyler and Casey Viner and says,
translation.it: Così contatta sia Tyler che Casey Viner e dice:

translation.en: "You guys need to delete everything. This is a murder case now."
translation.it: "Dovete cancellare tutto. Ora è un caso di omicidio".

translation.en: [Haze] We were actually trying to identify Tyler before the FBI did.
translation.it: Cercavamo di risalire a Tyler prima dell'FBI.

translation.en: I understand social media and the Internet pretty well, so,
translation.it: Conosco bene i social media e Internet,

translation.en: that was probably 30 minutes of actually constructing what happened.
translation.it: quindi ci misi circa 30 minuti per ricostruire i fatti.

translation.en: He was decent at hiding his real name,
translation.it: Era bravo a nascondere il suo nome, ma non lo era

translation.en: but he was not good at hiding his digital footprint whatsoever.
translation.it: Era bravo a nascondere il suo nome, ma non lo era a nascondere le sue tracce digitali.

translation.en: There were accounts that he would just pop back and forth through,
translation.it: C'erano vari account da cui entrava e usciva

translation.en: with "SWAuTistic" and "GoredTutor36" being the two main ones.
translation.it: e "SWAuTistic" e "GoredTutor36" erano i principali.

translation.en: I finally reached out to the "GoredTutor36" account,
translation.it: Alla fine contattai l'account "GoredTutor36"

translation.en: and said "Any chance you would like to talk to us about last night's swat?"
translation.it: e scrissi: "Ti va di parlarci dello swat di ieri sera?

translation.en: "We really do want to hear your side."
translation.it: Vorremmo sentire la tua versione".

translation.en: Tyler actually responded with, "Hmm. Hi. Here's my story."
translation.it: Tyler rispose: "Ciao. Ecco la mia storia".

translation.en: And he produced a screenshot
translation.it: E mi mostrò uno screenshot

translation.en: that was actually Shane Gaskill encouraging him and egging him on
translation.it: che dimostrava che Shane Gaskill l'aveva incoraggiato, spronato

translation.en: and giving him a previous address that his family had lived at.
translation.it: e gli aveva dato un suo vecchio indirizzo.

translation.en: Basically, that was Tyler saying that Shane encouraged him
translation.it: In pratica, fu Tyler a dire che era stato Shane a incitarlo a inviare la SWAT.

translation.en: to swat that address.
translation.it: che era stato Shane a incitarlo a inviare la SWAT.

translation.en: And I said, "I understand that, but why did he send it to you?"
translation.it: E io: "Ho capito, ma perché ha scelto proprio te?

translation.en: "Like is it a paying gig or just entertainment value?"
translation.it: Ti ha pagato o l'hai fatto solo per divertimento?"

translation.en: "How did you even get into swatting?" And he put, "I was swatted once."
translation.it: "Come hai iniziato con lo swatting?" E lui: "Perché ne sono stato vittima".

translation.en: I put, "No shit. What happened with that?"
translation.it: E io: "Ma dai! Cos'è successo?"

translation.en: And he put, "Well, I didn't die."
translation.it: E lui: "Non sono morto".

translation.en: Man, he's a fucking little prick.
translation.it: È proprio uno stronzo.

translation.en: I don't even put the full blame on him, but, man…
translation.it: Non do tutta la colpa a lui, ma insomma…

translation.en: He's just such a little fucking prick.
translation.it: È una testa di cazzo.

translation.en: -Just that one sentence. "I didn't die." -[interviewer] "I didn't die."
translation.it: - Basta quella frase. "Non sono morto." - Non sono morto.

translation.en: After he knows, by the way, that someone did die in this circumstance.
translation.it: Tra l'altro, dopo aver saputo che era morta una persona.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Già.

translation.en: [Haze] When word got out that these three gamers
translation.it: Quando si sparse la voce che questi tre giocatori

translation.en: got an innocent man killed by doing a swatting,
translation.it: avevano fatto uccidere un innocente con uno swat,

translation.en: the Internet responded
translation.it: il popolo di Internet rispose

translation.en: and they were not happy about what had happened.
translation.it: e non fu una bella reazione.

translation.en: He even made a post saying,
translation.it: Pubblicò anche un post per dire:

translation.en: "Hypothetically speaking, let's say I just kill myself right now
translation.it: "Ipoteticamente parlando, io adesso potrei anche uccidermi

translation.en: for the purpose of this getting through your guys' heads."
translation.it: per vedere se ve lo ficcate in testa.

translation.en: "Will justice have been served?"
translation.it: Sarebbe fatta giustizia?"

translation.en: One user responded, "I would be happier."
translation.it: Un utente rispose: "Io sarei più felice".

translation.en: Another one responded, "You won't be missed."
translation.it: Un altro rispose: "Non ci mancherai".

translation.en: "You were the cause."
translation.it: "È stata colpa tua."

translation.en: "Going to jail, bro."
translation.it: "In galera, fratello."

translation.en: "Lol I got someone killed but It's Just A Prank Bro so it's perfectly fine."
translation.it: "LOL, ho fatto uccidere qualcuno, ma era uno scherzo, quindi va benissimo."

translation.en: That's actually a pretty good summary of how he tried to play it off.
translation.it: In realtà è una buona sintesi di come abbia cercato di minimizzare.

translation.en: [Koerner] A tremendous amount of abuse is hurled his way.
translation.it: Gli rivolgono una valanga di insulti.

translation.en: And so when a big YouTube star reaches out to him,
translation.it: E così, quando una star di YouTube lo contatta,

translation.en: he consents to be interviewed.
translation.it: accetta l'intervista.

translation.en: [Keemstar] Ladies and gentlemen, we have the alleged swatter on here, "SWAuTistic."
translation.it: Signore e signori, è qui con me il presunto swatter "SWAuTistic".

translation.en: So you swatted that address. Correct?
translation.it: Hai inviato la SWAT a quell'indirizzo. Giusto? PRESENTATORE "DRAMA ALERT"

translation.en: -[Barriss] Sure. -And then this guy gets killed.
translation.it: - Sì. - E hanno ucciso un uomo.

translation.en: [Barriss] That's what happened, I guess. And you said this on Twitter.
translation.it: - Immagino sia andata così. - E tu hai scritto un post su Twitter.

translation.en: You said, "I didn't get anyone killed because I didn't discharge a weapon."
translation.it: Hai detto: "Io non ho ucciso nessuno perché non ho sparato".

translation.en: Do you take any responsibility for what happened?
translation.it: Ti ritieni un po' responsabile?

translation.en: [Barriss] Um, the argument can be made that the police would've never showed up if I didn't make the call.
translation.it: Certo, se non avessi chiamato, la polizia non si sarebbe presentata.

translation.en: However, I don't believe that I'm the only guilty party involved in this whole incident,
translation.it: Tuttavia, non credo di essere l'unico colpevole di questo incidente,

translation.en: considering I was contacted and almost instructed to swat,
translation.it: visto che sono stato contattato e quasi istruito su questo swat

translation.en: and taunted to swat that address,
translation.it: e che mi hanno sfidato a farlo.

translation.en: you could point the finger at the cop who killed someone, at the guy who made the call,
translation.it: Si può puntare il dito contro chi ha sparato, chi ha chiamato

translation.en: at the person who provided the address, saying, "Oh, look, this is where I live. Go ahead and swat me!"
translation.it: o chi ha dato l'indirizzo dicendo: "Ehi, io vivo qui. Mandami la SWAT!"

translation.en: Uh, so it's really debatable.
translation.it: È molto discutibile.

translation.en: [Dorroh] I recognized Tyler Barriss's voice right off the bat.
translation.it: Riconobbi subito la voce di Tyler Barriss.

translation.en: I had five investigators all huddle around my phone and we're sitting there watching it on my department phone.
translation.it: C'erano cinque inquirenti intorno a me e seguivamo tutto dal mio telefono.

translation.en: [Barriss] It really sucks being connected to this incident in any fucking way,
translation.it: È orribile avere a che fare con questo incidente

translation.en: and if I could rewind, I would, 'cause this is all stupid.
translation.it: e vorrei tornare indietro perché è stupido.

translation.en: It fit into his profile wanting to brag, wanting the recognition, everything.
translation.it: Si adattava al suo profilo: si vantava e voleva il merito.

translation.en: Are you worried that they'll find you? That the FBI will find you and you'll be arrested and charged for this?
translation.it: Non hai paura che ti trovino? Che l'FBI ti trovi e ti incrimini?

translation.en: [Barriss] Currently, not so much.
translation.it: Al momento, non tanto.

translation.en: [Koerner] One person posts on Twitter
translation.it: Una persona scrive su Twitter

translation.en: that they know that this is the same person responsible
translation.it: di sapere che si tratta della stessa persona

translation.en: for the KABC TV bomb threats in 2015,
translation.it: che aveva lanciato l'allarme bomba alla KABC TV nel 2015

translation.en: and the police are already investigating this.
translation.it: e la polizia sta già indagando.

translation.en: And they could see on his Twitter feed,
translation.it: Sul suo profilo Twitter,

translation.en: he's taking direct responsibility for what occurred on West McCormick Street.
translation.it: si assume la responsabilità dei fatti di West McCormick Street.

translation.en: So, it doesn't take much detective work to have a prime suspect in this case.
translation.it: Non serve dunque indagare molto per avere un sospettato principale.

translation.en: [Dorroh] The surveillance team went to his address that was listed on his California ID card,
translation.it: La squadra di sorveglianza andò all'indirizzo risultante dai documenti

translation.en: and followed him from there on foot to the library.
translation.it: e lo seguì a piedi da lì fino alla biblioteca.

translation.en: [interviewer] Did it ever occur to you in all of this that someone might die?
translation.it: Non hai mai pensato che potesse morire qualcuno?

translation.en: [Barriss] No, that never crossed my mind.
translation.it: No, non ci ho mai pensato.

translation.en: I've never killed anyone, so I don't know what that feels like.
translation.it: Non ho mai ucciso nessuno, quindi non so cosa si provi.

translation.en: But I've also never been responsible for someone dying.
translation.it: Ma non sono neanche mai stato responsabile della morte di qualcuno.

translation.en: But-but-but the consequences of killing someone, from what I know, are pretty severe.
translation.it: Ma le conseguenze di un omicidio, a quanto so, sono piuttosto gravi.

translation.en: You can get life in prison, you can get the death sentence.
translation.it: Si rischia l'ergastolo o la pena di morte.

translation.en: So… being responsible for someone dying--
translation.it: Quindi… essere responsabile della morte di qualcuno…

translation.en: I was pretty much the sole reason that the police even went to that house.
translation.it: L'unico responsabile dell'arrivo della polizia ero io.

translation.en: So when I found out someone died at the house that I sent the SWAT team to,
translation.it: Quando ho scoperto del morto nella casa dove avevo inviato la SWAT,

translation.en: I was… I couldn't… It was a very surreal moment for me.
translation.it: ero… È stato un momento molto surreale per me.

translation.en: [interviewer] Were you worried more about the ramifications on you,
translation.it: Ti preoccupavano di più le possibili conseguenze su di te

translation.en: or the fact that someone's life was just taken?
translation.it: o il fatto che qualcuno fosse stato ucciso?

translation.en: [Barriss] Well, you… I was… It was-- it was both.
translation.it: Beh, sai… Un po'… Un po' entrambe le cose.

translation.en: I didn't immediately feel guilty that someone died.
translation.it: Non mi sono sentito subito in colpa per la morte di qualcuno.

translation.en: I didn't know what to think. It's almost like life wasn't real anymore.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa pensare. Sembrava tutto irreale.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Police have arrested a 25-year-old man in Los Angeles.
translation.it: Hanno arrestato un uomo di 25 anni a LA.

translation.en: [reporter 2] This is 25-year-old Tyler Barriss.
translation.it: Si tratta di Tyler Barriss, 25 anni.

translation.en: We've learned that the LAPD has taken him into custody
translation.it: La polizia di Los Angeles l'ha arrestato

translation.en: and he is facing potential charges in this case.
translation.it: e dovrà rispondere di potenziali accuse.

translation.en: In 2015, he was arrested because he called in bomb threats
translation.it: Nel 2015, fu arrestato per l'allarme bomba

translation.en: into a CNN-affiliate ABC, a television station in California.
translation.it: in un'emittente televisiva californiana affiliata alla CNN.

translation.en: He eventually served two years in that case,
translation.it: In quel caso, alla fine scontò due anni,

translation.en: so this certainly would not be the first time that he's done some serious damage with his phone.
translation.it: quindi non sarebbe la prima volta che fa danni col suo telefono.

translation.en: [Haze] I got over there for the first time that following night.
translation.it: Andai lì per la prima volta la sera dopo.

translation.en: There was still blood on the front porch,
translation.it: C'era ancora sangue sulla veranda,

translation.en: on the carpet of the entryway.
translation.it: sul tappeto dell'ingresso.

translation.en: And that's when I did my first interview with Lisa.
translation.it: E fu allora che intervistai Lisa per la prima volta.

translation.en: We're here with the mother
translation.it: Siamo qui con la madre

translation.en: of last night's Wichita Police Department shooting victim.
translation.it: della vittima della sparatoria della polizia di Wichita.

translation.en: [Haze] It's like, "I don't…"
translation.it: È come se…

translation.en: "I don't really know how to tell you this,
translation.it: Non so come dirtelo,

translation.en: but it was a $1.50 bet on Call of Duty Online."
translation.it: ma era una scommessa da 1,50 dollari su Call of Duty Online.

translation.en: "That's… the root of all this."
translation.it: È nato tutto così.

translation.en: I mean, a $1.50 bet.
translation.it: Pensate. Una scommessa da 1,50 dollari.

translation.en: I think it was disgusting.
translation.it: Penso che sia stata una cosa… disgustosa.

translation.en: But it happened, and they're going to have to face it.
translation.it: Ma è successo e dovranno farci i conti.

translation.en: Everybody's gonna have to deal with it because it did happen.
translation.it: Toccherà a tutti, perché è successo davvero.

translation.en: You know? Even myself.
translation.it: Beh, perfino io.

translation.en: I have to deal with it.
translation.it: Devo farci i conti anch'io.

translation.en: [Haze] No matter how big of an asshole he is, no matter how terrible a person he is,
translation.it: Per quanto Tyler sia stronzo e sia una persona orribile

translation.en: at the end of the day, Tyler didn't pull the trigger.
translation.it: alla fine non è stato lui a premere il grilletto.

translation.en: [Haze] Twelve other officers that night did not pull a trigger.
translation.it: E nemmeno altri 12 agenti.

translation.en: There was one officer that pulled a trigger.
translation.it: L'ha fatto solo un agente.

translation.en: The reaction was anger in this area.
translation.it: La reazione è stata di rabbia.

translation.en: [woman] It was a senseless murder
translation.it: Un omicidio insensato… VEGLIA - 9 FEBBRAIO 2018

translation.en: and we hope to find out more information as it comes out.
translation.it: VEGLIA - 9 FEBBRAIO 2018 …e speriamo di scoprire altre informazioni.

translation.en: We need to stand out and make sure things like this don't happen,
translation.it: Dobbiamo impegnarci affinché queste cose non accadano più,

translation.en: hold people accountable,
translation.it: prendere i responsabili

translation.en: and be here for those who have lost this great man,
translation.it: e sostenere le persone che hanno perso questo grande uomo

translation.en: 28 years young.
translation.it: di 28 anni.

translation.en: [vigil attendee] I think people are pretty horrified about what happened.
translation.it: Credo che la gente sia inorridita per l'accaduto.

translation.en: They are fearful.
translation.it: Ha paura.

translation.en: They know it could've happened to anybody.
translation.it: Poteva succedere a chiunque.

translation.en: If we have a police force
translation.it: Se le nostre forze di polizia

translation.en: which does the opposite of de-escalation in situations like this,
translation.it: Se le nostre forze di polizia fanno tutt'altro che allentare la tensione in certe situazioni,

translation.en: you have these tragedies.
translation.it: succedono queste tragedie.

translation.en: [Haze] In Wichita, in Kansas in general,
translation.it: A Wichita, in Kansas, in generale,

translation.en: they don't name the officers. They protect the officers.
translation.it: non fanno i nomi degli agenti. Li proteggono.

translation.en: [reporter] Will we be able to get the name of the officer involved?
translation.it: POLIZIA WICHITA Riusciremo a sapere il nome dell'agente coinvolto?

translation.en: Yeah, it's important to know that the department has a long history
translation.it: È importante sapere che il dipartimento, da sempre,

translation.en: of not releasing names of officers involved in shootings.
translation.it: non fa i nomi degli agenti coinvolti.

translation.en: [Dion Lefler] It's very difficult to get information on these incidents.
translation.it: È molto difficile ottenere informazioni su questi incidenti.

translation.en: Kansas has possibly the weakest open records law in the country.
translation.it: Il Kansas ha forse la legge sulla trasparenza più debole del Paese.

translation.en: They basically hope you don't find out and the statute of limitations expires
translation.it: Sperano che tu non lo scopra prima che scada la prescrizione,

translation.en: so they don't have to pay out on a case.
translation.it: così non devono pagare per un caso.

translation.en: The national average for shootings was about one for every 1300 officers.
translation.it: La media nazionale delle sparatorie era circa una su 1300 agenti.

translation.en: In Wichita, 2012, we had one shooting death
translation.it: Wichita, nel 2012, ha avuto una sparatoria letale

translation.en: for every 120 officers, approximately.
translation.it: ogni 120 agenti circa.

translation.en: So we were about 11 times higher than the national average here in Wichita.
translation.it: Una percentuale 11 volte superiore alla media nazionale.

translation.en: [Haze] I received an email
translation.it: Ho ricevuto un'email

translation.en: and the person said it had been a minute "since I've given you anything."
translation.it: e quella persona mi ha detto: "È un pezzo che non ti do informazioni.

translation.en: "Your shooter's Justin Rapp."
translation.it: Ha sparato Justin Rapp".

translation.en: [interviewer] You're first to publish his name. [Haze] Yes.
translation.it: - Sei il primo a pubblicare il suo nome. - Sì.

translation.en: [Ann Jones] Justin Rapp has been with our department now eight years.
translation.it: Justin Rapp è nel nostro dipartimento da otto anni.

translation.en: He has formal military training.
translation.it: Ha un addestramento militare.

translation.en: He has been featured in episodes of Cops a couple of times.
translation.it: È apparso in alcuni episodi di Cops un paio di volte.

translation.en: [Rapp] Get on the ground, right now!
translation.it: A terra, subito!

translation.en: He has gotten many reports of "use of force" against him.
translation.it: Ha ricevuto molte denunce per "uso della forza".

translation.en: [Haze] We've been told there is around a dozen incident reports against Justin
translation.it: Ci hanno detto che c'erano state una dozzina di denunce contro Justin

translation.en: before the shooting of Andrew Finch.
translation.it: prima dell'omicidio di Finch.

translation.en: On one of our highway overpasses we put "Arrest Officer Rapp."
translation.it: Su un cavalcavia abbiamo messo la scritta "Arrestate l'agente Rapp".

translation.en: We just wanted to make sure Rapp's name stayed important.
translation.it: Volevamo solo mantenere l'attenzione su quel nome.

translation.en: That's also why we made the T-shirts.
translation.it: Abbiamo anche delle magliette.

translation.en: One of my friends had seen that movie, The Three Billboards or whatever.
translation.it: Un mio amico aveva visto il film Tre manifesti, o qualcosa del genere,

translation.en: And he said, "Why don't we do that?"
translation.it: e disse: "Perché non lo facciamo?"

translation.en: [reporter] Billboards are designed to catch your attention,
translation.it: I cartelli hanno lo scopo di attirare l'attenzione,

translation.en: but four digital billboards in Wichita aren't marketed towards getting your money.
translation.it: ma i quattro cartelli digitali di Wichita non puntano ai soldi.

translation.en: They're asking for justice.
translation.it: Chiedono giustizia.

translation.en: [Jones] He didn't follow any procedure, any protocol.
translation.it: Non ha seguito alcuna procedura, alcun protocollo.

translation.en: He didn't even bother to think that this guy might be a hostage.
translation.it: Non si è nemmeno preoccupato che potesse essere un ostaggio.

translation.en: He just shot him dead and it could have happened to any of us.
translation.it: Gli ha sparato e basta e poteva succedere a chiunque.

translation.en: So I think that's why the community has stayed so involved
translation.it: Credo sia per questo che la comunità si è impegnata tanto a pretendere l'arresto di Justin Rapp.

translation.en: in pushing for the arrest of Justin Rapp.
translation.it: che la comunità si è impegnata tanto a pretendere l'arresto di Justin Rapp.

translation.en: He needs to be charged for the murder of Andrew Finch.
translation.it: Dev'essere accusato di quell'omicidio.

translation.en: …express thoughts and prayers…
translation.it: …pensiamo e preghiamo…

translation.en: [Lisa] The cops can't just go around shooting people without any consequences.
translation.it: I poliziotti non possono sparare alla gente senza conseguenze.

translation.en: I mean, that cop murdered my son.
translation.it: Quel poliziotto ha ucciso mio figlio.

translation.en: [Lisa] My granddaughter saw the shooting
translation.it: Mia nipote ha assistito alla sparatoria

translation.en: and had to see her uncle lay there dying.
translation.it: e ha dovuto vedere morire suo zio.

translation.en: She's only 17,
translation.it: Ha solo 17 anni

translation.en: but she's had a lot of trauma in her life.
translation.it: e ha già subito molti traumi nella sua vita.

translation.en: And I don't know if she'll survive this. I don't know.
translation.it: Non so se stavolta sopravvivrà. Non lo so davvero.

translation.en: [Francis] I'm not going to lie,
translation.it: Sarò sincero,

translation.en: I did contemplate suicide, many times after that.
translation.it: ho pensato al suicidio molte volte.

translation.en: You know?
translation.it: Insomma…

translation.en: But…
translation.it: Però…

translation.en: I just… It's just-- It's just…
translation.it: Io… È solo che…

translation.en: Hold on, I'm sorry.
translation.it: Aspetta, scusami.

translation.en: We're going to teach you how to make cake.
translation.it: Ti insegneremo a fare le torte.

translation.en: [Haze] Adelina clearly had some issues with what had happened.
translation.it: Adelina ovviamente aveva dei problemi per via dell'accaduto.

translation.en: [Lisa] She was forced to see her father figure dying.
translation.it: È stata costretta a veder morire la sua figura paterna.

translation.en: She could not stand
translation.it: Non sopportava

translation.en: the constant nightmares and flashbacks.
translation.it: gli incubi e i flashback continui.

translation.en: And she could not stand to be alone.
translation.it: E non sopportava di stare da sola.

translation.en: Exactly a year and two weeks, exactly,
translation.it: Esattamente un anno e due settimane dopo,

translation.en: this past January 11th…
translation.it: l'11 gennaio scorso…

translation.en: Adelina shot herself in the head.
translation.it: Adelina si è sparata in testa.

translation.en: [Lefler] And then her boyfriend, who found her having just shot herself,
translation.it: E anche il suo ragazzo, che l'ha trovata subito dopo,

translation.en: he wound up committing suicide too.
translation.it: si è suicidato.

translation.en: So really the death toll from this is three, not one.
translation.it: Quindi il bilancio delle vittime è di tre, non una.

translation.en: [Francis] I'm surprised I'm still here today.
translation.it: Sono sorpreso di essere ancora qui

translation.en: I'm surprised I'm sitting here doing this interview today, because…
translation.it: Sono sorpreso di essere ancora qui e di fare questa intervista, perché…

translation.en: I thought it was going to be me that did it.
translation.it: Pensavo che sarei stato io a farlo.

translation.en: That night, she had taken me to work,
translation.it: Quella sera mi aveva portato al lavoro

translation.en: and she's supposed to pick me up at ten o'clock and we're supposed to hang out afterwards.
translation.it: e doveva venire a prendermi alle 22:00 per andare da qualche parte.

translation.en: Well, my cousin Jaden had came
translation.it: Beh… Invece fu mio cugino Jaden a venirmi a prendere e io avevo detto ad Adelina:

translation.en: and he picked me up and I had told Adelina,
translation.it: Invece fu mio cugino Jaden a venirmi a prendere e io avevo detto ad Adelina:

translation.en: [voice breaks] "You don't have to come pick me up. It's okay."
translation.it: "Non importa che venga a prendermi. Tranquilla".

translation.en: So, I was supposed to be with her,
translation.it: Avrei dovuto essere con lei,

translation.en: at the same exact time that she had killed herself.
translation.it: nel momento esatto in cui si è uccisa.

translation.en: And I wasn't.
translation.it: Invece non c'ero.

translation.en: I just feel like I could have stopped it. I know her.
translation.it: Sento che avrei potuto fermarla. La conosco.

translation.en: That's why I should have seen that something was wrong.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto capire i segnali.

translation.en: There was-- There was, like…
translation.it: C'era…

translation.en: [judge] Madam Clerk, can you call the next item, please?
translation.it: Cancelliere, passiamo al prossimo punto?

translation.en: [county clerk] Lisa Finch, Andrew Finch shooting.
translation.it: Lisa Finch, sparatoria Andrew Finch.

translation.en: [Lisa] The death of my son has changed every iota of my being.
translation.it: La morte di mio figlio ha cambiato ogni briciola del mio essere.

translation.en: I never wanted to be in the public eye. My preference before this was staying at home
translation.it: Non ho mai amato i riflettori. Prima preferivo stare a casa

translation.en: and not to be put on display.
translation.it: e non mettermi in mostra.

translation.en: The person I was before no longer exists.
translation.it: La persona che ero prima non esiste più.

translation.en: The concept of due process goes back as far… to 1215 A.D.
translation.it: Il concetto di giusto processo risale al 1215 d.C.,

translation.en: from Clause 39 of the Magna Carta.
translation.it: alla clausola 39 della Magna Carta.

translation.en: This should indicate that due process is not new.
translation.it: È chiaro, dunque, che il giusto processo non è nuovo.

translation.en: Shouldn't law enforcement and public officials be aware
translation.it: Forze dell'ordine e funzionari pubblici devono saperlo

translation.en: and abide by this constitutional right?
translation.it: e attenersi a questo diritto costituzionale.

translation.en: [judge] L-Lisa. Can you wrap it up right quick? You've gone over five minutes. So…
translation.it: Lisa, può arrivare alle conclusioni? Ha parlato oltre cinque minuti e…

translation.en: My time has been taken away from me, sir.
translation.it: Mi è stato già tolto il tempo, signore.

translation.en: -This is my time. Are you…? Do you-- -Right.
translation.it: - Ora tocca a me. Lei… - Ok.

translation.en: [woman] She can have my five minutes.
translation.it: Le cedo i miei minuti.

translation.en: -[judge] She can't. That's not the rules. -You work for the public.
translation.it: - Non può. Non è previsto. - Lei è un lavoratore pubblico.

translation.en: -[judge] Correct. -I'm taking my time.
translation.it: - Sì. - Mi prendo il mio tempo.

translation.en: I'm gonna make them so uncomfortable.
translation.it: Li metterò molto a disagio.

translation.en: I am.
translation.it: Puoi scommetterci.

translation.en: And I'm going to continue talking about this…
translation.it: E continuerò a parlarne…

translation.en: [Jones] She's strong. And she's a fighter.
translation.it: È forte ed è combattiva.

translation.en: -And, uh… -[applause]
translation.it: E…

translation.en: …she's not going to let them get away with this.
translation.it: Non gliela farà passare liscia.

translation.en: She's just not.
translation.it: Di sicuro.

translation.en: [Marc Bennett] To charge Officer Number 1 would require evidence, not 20/20 hindsight.
translation.it: Per incriminare l'agente numero uno servono prove e non il senno di poi.

translation.en: That it was unreasonable for him to believe in that moment that the man who came to the door
translation.it: Va dimostrato che, in quel momento, era assurdo pensare che l'uomo alla porta

translation.en: posed a risk to the officers near the house,
translation.it: fosse una minaccia per gli agenti.

translation.en: there is insufficient evidence to overcome self-defense immunity under Kansas law.
translation.it: Non ci sono prove sufficienti per superare l'immunità prevista dalla legge del Kansas.

translation.en: So under Kansas law and the facts of this case,
translation.it: Vista la legge e i fatti,

translation.en: I conclude that no charges will be filed against the officer for the death of Andrew Finch.
translation.it: decido di non procedere con le accuse contro l'agente per la morte di Finch.

translation.en: [reporter] Deputy Chief Troy Livingston says it was in this moment when Finch dropped his hand,
translation.it: Secondo il vice capo Troy Livingston, quando Finch abbassò la mano,

translation.en: an officer thought he reached for a weapon.
translation.it: un agente credette che prendesse un'arma.

translation.en: You see the officer pull the trigger on the lower left side of the screen.
translation.it: Si vede l'agente sparare in basso a sinistra dello schermo.

translation.en: You have officers from the other side also giving commands
translation.it: Anche gli altri agenti davano ordini

translation.en: and they were all consistent about "Put your hands up, walk towards us,"
translation.it: e gridavano tutti: "Mani in alto, si avvicini".

translation.en: um, but he continued to drop them down by his waistband.
translation.it: Ma lui continuò a tenerle giù sulla cintura.
